data.title: Yul Brynner
data.text:
AKA Yul Borisovich Bryner

Born: 11-Jul-1920

Birthplace: Vladivostok, Russia

Died: 10-Oct-1985

Location of death: New York City

Cause of death: Cancer - Lung

Remains: Buried, St. Robert Churchyard, La Tourraine, France

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: The King and I

The name he sometimes claimed, Taidje Khan, is bogus.

Father: Boris Bryner

Mother: Marousia Blagavidova

Wife: Virginia Gilmore (m. 1944, div. 1960)

Son: Yul Brynner II ("Rock", b. 23-Dec-1946)

Daughter: Lark (b. 1958 illegitimate)

Wife: Doris Kleiner (m. 1960, div. 1967)

Daughter: Victoria Brynner (b. Nov-1962)

Wife: Jacqueline de Croisset (m. 1971, div. 1981)

Daughter: Mia Brynner (adopted 1974)

Daughter: Melody Brynner (adopted 1975)

Wife: Kathy Lee (m. 1983)

Oscar for Best Actor 1957 for The King and I

Hollywood Walk of Fame 6162 Hollywood Blvd.

Endorsement of Lauder's Scotch 1975

Risk Factors: Smoking
